data.description: The prefix character(s) that players must use before commands in chat
The name displayed when Takaro sends messages in game chat
Enable or disable the economy system for earning and spending currency
The name of the currency used in the economy system
Enable developer mode for custom modules and advanced features
A prefix added to all messages sent by Takaro in game chat
The domain name for this Takaro instance
Enable or disable automatic role synchronization between Discord and Takaro
When enabled, Discord roles will override Takaro roles during synchronization. When disabled, Takaro roles will override Discord roles. Only affects roles that are linked between systems.
When enabled, players receive feedback when they type an unknown or invalid command

data.value: Unknown command. Type /help for available commands.
data.description: The message sent to players when they type an unknown command
